Roulette - tips, advice and secrets

Look for a European single-zero roulette. Due to the single zero wheel has only 37 number slots, which increases the odds of the player. The American wheel has a double zero out of zero, and thus a total of 38 reference subjects.

Introduction to Roulette

The game of roulette easily claimed the place as the most popular casino game in Europe. The reasons for this state are likely to be several: the special environment at the roulette table, the odds of the game, simple rules, and not least the many myths and stories of great fortunes that have been lost or gained in a single rotation.
